name: Cucumber Pasta
keywords: cucumber, fusilli, mint leaves, pasta, ricotta, smoked salmon, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 3 large cucumbers, peeled, seeded and cut into 2-inch-long juliennes
1 tablespoon salt for the pasta, plus more to taste
Freshly ground black pepper to taste
1/4 cup fresh mint leaves, sliced into chiffonad

recipeInstructions.text: Place the ricotta cheese in a serving bowl and beat with a fork until smooth. Stir in the garlic, cucumbers, salmon, parsley and capers.
Cook the pasta in a large pot of well-salted boiling water until al dente. Drain. Add the pasta to the sauce mixture and toss. Season with salt and pepper, top with the mint and serve immediately.
